title: Unhandled exception in event loop: when pipe into to brownie console
body:
### Environment information

* `brownie` v1.11.5
* `Ganache CLI v6.9.1 (ganache-core: 2.10.2)
* `solc` Version: 0.6.8
* Python Version: 3.7.5
* OS: osx

### What was wrong?

Example code:

```
#!/bin/bash

source $HOME/venv/bin/activate

input="$(cat <<EOF
import json
file = open("abi.json","w")
json.dump(eBlocBroker.abi, file)
file.close()
EOF
)"

echo "$input" | brownie console 
```

-----------

Experiment with a simple empty echo into it:

```
$ echo "" | brownie console --network eblocpoa
Brownie v1.11.5 - Python development framework for Ethereum

No project was loaded.
Warning: Input is not a terminal (fd=0).
Brownie environment is ready.
>>> ^[[6>>>

Unhandled exception in event loop:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/asyncio/events.py", line 88, in _run
    self._context.run(self._callback, *self._args)
  File "/home/netlab/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/prompt_toolkit/application/application.py", line 669, in read_from_input
    f.set_exception(EOFError)

Exception invalid state
Press ENPress ENTER to continue...

Unhandled exception in event loop:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/asyncio/events.py", line 88, in _run
    self._context.run(self._callback, *self._args)
  File "/home/netlab/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/prompt_toolkit/application/application.py", line 669, in read_from_input
    f.set_exception(EOFError)

Exception invalid state
Press ENPress ENTER to continue...

Unhandled exception in event loop:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/asyncio/events.py", line 88, in _run
    self._context.run(self._callback, *self._args)
  File "/home/netlab/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/prompt_toolkit/application/application.py", line 669, in read_from_input
    f.set_exception(EOFError)

Exception invalid state
Press ENPress ENTER to continue...
```
